text: Ithi â€œngakube ngifuna enye iNkosi esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi kulapho yena eyiNkosi yazo zonke izinto futhi awukho umphefumulo ozuza (okunye) ngaphandle kokuqondene nawo futhi akekho umthwali womthwalo ekufanele awuthwalele omunye manjalo kuseNkosini yenu ukubuyela kwenu ngakho-ke uyonitshena ngalokho enaniphikisana kukona
